text: IRC +10420 is a yellow hypergiant star located 16,000 light years away in the constellation Aquila. Estimates of its diameter range from 380https://arxiv.org/abs/1710.01027 to over 1,300 times that of the Sun. Its temperature has increased recently, so it may be turning into a blue hypergiant.https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2002ARep...46..139K == References == Category:Supergiants Category:Stars
title: IRC +10420
